title: Mastermind I: CLI
description: A command line version of the classic Mastermind code breaking game using Node JS.

title: Mastermind II: GUI
description: Mastermind with an all new GUI using React.

title: Mastermind III: API
description: Build your own version of the Mastermind Game using the Mastermind API!

title: Mastermind IV: Evolved
description: Create an account, store your game history and compare your skills against the leaderboard.

title: Mastermind V: Mobile
description: Take Mastermind wherever you go on your Android or iPhone!

title: Mastermind VI: Battlefield
description: Compete against your friends online in real-time and see if you are truly the best code-breaker.
